long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GoAge is a simple yet powerful browser extension that helps you determine the appropriate age range for dating based on your age. Utilizing the widely known formula, GoAge calculates both the minimum and maximum dating ages to provide you with a safe and socially accepted age range.

The extension uses the formula "(Your age / 2) + 7" for the minimum age and "(Your age - 7) * 2" for the maximum age. Additional rules ensure that the minimum age does not drop below 18 and the maximum age does not exceed 70, providing appropriate age ranges for users of all ages.

Whether you are curious about the socially accepted dating age range or seeking to understand more about relationship age dynamics, GoAge offers valuable insights tailored to your age.

Key features of GoAge include:
- Instant calculation of minimum and maximum dating ages based on your input age.
- User-friendly interface that is easy to navigate and interact with.
- Automatic saving of your last entered age for convenience.
- Enforcement of age restrictions to ensure appropriate dating ranges.
- Real-time feedback for an enhanced user experience.

Your feedback is essential for us. Please share your suggestions and bug reports to help us improve the functionality and user experience of GoAge.
